increase_sales.description: Convert more prospects into paying customers

questions.question_text: How do I increase sales at my (size) business
What pricing strategy should I use for my (product/service) to maximize revenue
How can I upsell more effectively to my existing customers
What promotions should I run for my business during the (holiday/event season)
How do I convert more website visitors into paying customers

build_brand_awareness.description: Get your brand noticed by the right people

questions.question_text: How do I increase brand awareness for my (unique proposition) (industry) brand among (demographic) in urban areas
What content strategy should I use to build my brand on (LinkedIn/Business Channel) for B2B buyers
How can I get media coverage for my (business type) in (location)
What partnerships would boost brand visibility for my (location) (business type) service
How do I differentiate my (business type) from competitors in a crowded market

drive_foot_traffic.description: Bring more customers to your physical location

questions.question_text: How can I increase foot traffic to my boutique in (location) by (XX%)
What (local/regional/national) marketing tactics should I use to attract more customers to my (business type)
How do I compete with national chains to drive traffic to my (location) (business type)
What events should I host at my (location) (business type) to bring in new customers
How can I leverage (social media platform) to drive more visits to my (location) (business type)
How do I generate (XZY) more qualified leads per month for my (business type) business
What lead magnet should I create for (industry type) investors interested in (business type)
How can I optimize my (website/social platform) to capture more leads from organic search traffic
What outreach strategy should I use to generate B2B leads in the (industry type) sector
How do I nurture cold leads into warm prospects for my (business type)
How should I launch my new product to (demographic)) with a budget of $(XXXXXX)
What pre-launch marketing should I use to build anticipation for my (business type))
How do I price my (product/service) for (demographic) when launching (timeframe)
What distribution channels should I use to launch my (unique business proposition) (business type) in (location)
How can I get early adopters to try my new (product))and provide testimonials
How do I reduce customer churn for my (product/service) from (range) (weekly/monthly/annually)
What loyalty program should I create for my (business type) customers
How can I re-engage inactive customers who haven't purchased from my (digital/brick-and-mortar) buiness in (timeframe)
What customer service improvements will increase retention for my (business type) in competitive downtown
How do I turn one-time buyers into repeat customers for my (product/service)
